channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree Overhangs into Road and Two Properties, 9th October
item.description:
This issue was initially reported in June, yet no action was taken, and the case was closed by the Council without resolution. Upon opening a new case, the situation remained unchanged until 09/10/25, when the Council claimed that the tree had been crown lifted. This statement is entirely inaccurate—no work has been carried out, as clearly evidenced by the attached photographs. Furthermore, the pavement has now lifted, posing an additional hazard. We urgently request clarification and immediate action to address this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Friar Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chain removed from emergency access gate turning street into rat run, 9th October
item.description:
